titles.title: To authorize the sponsor of the Burbank-Glendale-Pasadena Airport in California to impose noise restrictions on operations at the airport without the approval of the Federal Aviation Administration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 5/14/1999--Introduced. Authorizes the sponsor of the Burbank-Glendale-Pasadena Airport in California to impose noise restrictions on operations (including curfews and limits on the number of daily take-offs and landings) at the airport without Federal Aviation Administration approval.
